channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Browsers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Browsers

item.title: CVE-2017-0012|2024-08-05T12:47:57.521Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- browsers
item.description: Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 and Microsoft Edge allow remote attackers to spoof web content via a crafted web site, aka "Microsoft Browser Spoofing Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different from those described in CVE-2017-0033 and CVE-2017-0069.
